sections.heading: Overview
content:
Kathy G. Wise, RD, LD, is a registered, licensed dietitian with extensive
experience creating nutrition programs for hospitals, corporations, and
individuals. She draws on her scientific expertise and her lively sense of
humor as she makes good nutrition fun, simple, and meaningful for everyone.
Wise provides nutritional consulting services for restaurants, chefs, grocery
stores, companies, and families. A frequent speaker on nutrition and wellness,
Wise has appeared on radio and television programs and is often quoted in the
press.

In 1993 Wise established Wise Nutrition Concepts, Inc. to help people achieve and
maintain good patterns of nutrition for lifelong well-being. She separates the
fads from the facts and gives professional support to people in the process of
achieving a healthier lifestyle.

Wise has a bachelor's of science degree in nutrition and dietetics and is a
spokesperson for the American Heart Association. She is a member of the
American Dietetic Association, the Ohio Dietetic Association, and the American
College of Sports Medicine.
